{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-ACRH13 |revision=(US) |upc=889349497791 |asin=B01LXL1AR8 |newegg=N82E16833320341 |series=AC1300 |est_release_date=09/10/2016 |fcc_date=08/11/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACRH00 |ic_id=3568A-RTACRH00 |pcb_id=1244-01001065-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25N01GVZEIG |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;159, 649E, 633;2;;QFN-16; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, 610NT, 1610, MY;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.50.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17,38:D5:47 |oui_eth=AC:9E:17,38:D5:47 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 Dual-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH13/}} (US) *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com "1244-01001065-50Z" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|ASUS RT-AC58U|Edimax}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTACRH00 MSQ-RTACRH00] (2016-08-11) :Equipment: Wireless-AC1300 Dual Band Gigabit Router :Brand Name: ASUS; Model No.: [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3094140 FCC Report] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH13]], RT-ACRH00, (RT-AC53HP ?) *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]], RT-AC58MU, RT-AC58HP, RT-AC58UHP *ASUS RT-AC1200G+ B1 ([[ASUS RT-AC1200GP B1]]) *[[ASUS RT-AC1300G+]], ASUS RT-AC1300G+ B1 *ASUS RT-AC1300HP, [[ASUS RT-AC1300UHP]] :Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3094139 FCC label]. ===Overview=== *'''Quad-Core Processor''' - Responsive network performance and data handling *'''128MB Memory''' for Multi-Tasking - Fast memory architecture enables :stable multiple simultaneous download streams on multiple devices *'''Super-Fast Wi-Fi''' - Dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi with concurrent speeds :up to 867Mbps (5GHz) and 400Mbps (2.4GHz) *'''Improved Wi-Fi Range''' - Four external 5dBi antennas for improved :Wi-Fi range and multi-device performance *'''MU-MIMO''' - High technology for the best multi-device performance *'''USB 3.0''' - Up to 10x faster data transfer speeds ===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1300'' (400Mbps [2.4GHz] + 867Mbps [5GHz]) * Antennas: 4x external high-gain 5dBi antenna * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x ''USB 3.0'' * Vendor firmware features: : MU-MIMO, Smart QoS, Parental Control, Guest Network, : VPN server: L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server : VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client : AiCloud personal cloud service, AiDisk : 3G/4G data sharing, Printer Server * Vendor firmware operation modes: : wireless router, access point * Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 1.5A current * Dimensions: 207 x 148.8 x 35.5 mm (LxWxH) * Weight: 395 g ===Reviews=== *[http://www.guru3d.com/news-story/asus-rt-ac58u-dual-band-802-11ac-wifi-router.html ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' on '''Guru3D'''] *[http://benchmarkreviews.com/39519/asus-rt-ac58u-wi-fi-router-announced/ ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' on '''BenchmarkReviews'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/rtac58u/ ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' Review on '''OpenITforum'''] *[http://www.mbreviews.com/asus-rt-acrh13-review/ ''ASUS RT-ACRH13'' on '''MBReviews'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1596-asus-rt-ac58u-quadcore-z-wifi-ac1300/ ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/207-asus-rt-ac58u/ Gallery on '''OpenITforum'''] ([https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1490-asus-przedstawia-router-rt-ac58u/ PR]) :OUI: 38:D5:47 *[http://w3w.openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=14&t=4246 ''Asus RT-AC58U (IPQ4018)'' on '''OpenRouter''' forums] :[http://www.tech-blog.pl/pliki/asus_rt-ac58u_1.jpg PCB image] [http://www.tech-blog.pl/pliki/asus_rt-ac58u_2.jpg CPU, Flash, RAM image] *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey'''] ===See also=== *[[ASUS RT-ACRH13]] (US) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH13/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH17]] (US) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *[[ASUS RT-AC42U]] (EU) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]] (EU) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC58U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC82U]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' • ([https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c QCA]) __NOTOC__
